name: Hidden Paws Mystery
description: What is this cat doing here? And where are his friends? Explore strange and beautiful islands to find all the little kittens hidden there.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
